Tag_Youmay.description: the genetic memory | the [[Kretan Bull | legendary beast]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Kretan Bull was a creature of legend captured by Herakles, though it was the gods' will that such creatures once more roam the land. Kassandra needed to do more than capture this bull.'

General_Description: '''The Kretan Bull''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the advice of [[Daphnae]], the leader of the [[Daughters of Artemis]], Kassandra travelled to [[Messara]] to hunt down the fabled [[Kretan Bull]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra tracked the Kretan Bull to a bog in central Messenia.  Ikaros spied it from afar.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Look at that. Father of the [[Minotaur]].''
Kassandra engaged the bull in combat and dodged its charges. As the battle dragged on, the bull seemed to leverage its front legs and horns to flail its entire body weight in successive strikes at Kassandra, but she eventually defeated it.  She collected its pelt.

Kassandra returned to Daphnae to deliver the pelt.
*'''Daphnae:''' ''Beast Slayer, I'm glad to see you again.''
("I have the Kretan Bull pelt.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The bull put up quite a fight, but his pelt is yours.''
Kassandra handed the pelt over to Daphnae.
*'''Daphnae:''' ''You are remarkable!''
<tabber>
|-|I am skilled.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Years of training made me a warrior. Life as a ''misthios'' has honed those abilities.''
*'''Daphnae:''' ''Then at the least you should applaud yourself for your dedication to your... ''art.
|-|It was a worthy opponent.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No more than the bull. The gods have blessed us with a world of wonder, and we should honor it.''
*'''Daphnae:''' ''Spoken like a true Daughter of Artemis.''
</tabber>
(Leave – "I'll return soon.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll return when I have more pelts.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra tracked the Kretan Bull to a bog in central Messenia.  Ikaros spied it from afar.

Kassandra engaged the bull in combat and dodged its charges. As the battle dragged on, the bull seemed to leverage its front legs and horns to flail its entire body weight in successive strikes at Kassandra, but she eventually defeated it.  She collected its pelt.
Kassandra returned to Daphnae to deliver the pelt.

Kassandra handed the pelt over to Daphnae.
